Kọleji nke Mmụta Ȯra Jigawa bụ ụlọ ọrụ Ȯra gọọmentị agụmakwụkwọ di elu dị na Gumel, Ȯra Jigawa, Naijiria
Ọ jikọtara ya na Mahadum nke Bayero maka mmemme nzere ya
Onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ugbu a bụ Saidu Barau Ahmad.
E hiwere Kọleji nke Mmụta Ȯra Jigawa na 1976.
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-enye nkuzi ndị a;
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jikọtara ya na Mahadum nke Bayero iji nye mmemme na-eduga na Bachelor nke Mmụta, (B.Ed.) na;
